content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM is the Company, where every employee can realize his/ her potential, both in professional and career aspects. Stay up-to-date with the latest news in the sphere of corporate learning — make use of all with \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"http://epmsp002/Training/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Training Portal \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"(please use VPN or company network to access) capacities!\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"By the way, you can find out about Global Competence Framework \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://info.epam.com/gcf.html\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"here\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If any questions regarding this part arise, address them to \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:WFAHR@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"WFA Human Resource\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:WFACareerDevelopment@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"WFA Career Development\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", your Manager.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
